import React, { useState } from 'react' export const AddStaff= ()=> { var [name,setName]=useState() const nameUpdate=(event)=>{ // Dealing with name field changes to update our state setName(event.target.value) } const handleSubmit=()=> { // Once the form has been submitted, this function will post to the backend const postURL = "http://localhost:5000/login" //Our previously set up route in the backend fetch(postURL, { method: 'POST', headers: { 'Accept': 'application/json', 'Content-Type': 'application/json', }, body: JSON.stringify({ // We should keep the fields consistent for managing this data later name: name, clockedIn:false, dates:[] }) }) .then(()=>{ // Once posted, the user will be notified alert('You have been added to the system!'); }) } return (
